I had my roof and gutters replaced by Concord Roofing and Construction a few years ago, and I couldn’t be happier with the results. I had no idea what I wanted, but Ted guided me through the process and helped me land on an amazing result. … More

Six years ago our roof was replaced after it suffered hail damage. We worked with Ted and we couldn't have been more satisfied with the quality of the work.  When it came to renovating our 26 year old home(2 baths, kitchen, flooring), I … More Response from the owner a year ago Theresa, thanks for recommending us to others and leaving a positive review.  It was a pleasure working with you.  Please let us know if any of your friends need roofing help.

Best customer service and quality of work! Ted was so helpful with everything from navigating the insurace process, choosing the right shingles and the installation of the roof.
